description: This Java class defines a data transfer object (DTO) named TicketMetricEntry, representing ticket metrics with fields like application, month, totalTickets, slaAdherencePercent, and mttrHours. It includes constructors, getters, and setters, and is annotated with Swagger annotations for API documentation.

classes.name: TicketMetricEntry
classes.description: A DTO encapsulating metrics for tickets, optionally scoped by application and month.

methods.name: TicketMetricEntry
methods.description: Parameterized constructor to initialize all fields.

methods.name: getMonth
methods.description: Returns the month in yyyy-MM format.

methods.name: setMonth
methods.description: Sets the month in yyyy-MM format.

methods.name: getTotalTickets
methods.description: Returns the total number of tickets.

methods.name: setTotalTickets
methods.description: Sets the total number of tickets.

methods.name: getMttrHours
methods.description: Returns the mean time to resolution in hours.

methods.name: setMttrHours
methods.description: Sets the mean time to resolution in hours.
